vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.cashOut (patch_7.sol#24-32):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_7.sol#26-30)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_7.sol#27)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.cashOut (patch_7.sol#24-32):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_7.sol#26-30)
	- TransferLog.addMessage(msg.sender,_am,CashOut) (patch_7.sol#28)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_7.sol#26-30)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastBlock (patch_7.sol#29)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: newMessage in Log.addMessage (patch_7.sol#49) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.deposit (patch_7.sol#16-22):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.addMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Deposit) (patch_7.sol#19)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastBlock (patch_7.sol#20)

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.message: ETH_FUND.MinDeposit should be constant (patch_7.sol#6)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_7.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_7.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in ETH_FUND.cashOut (patch_7.sol#24-32):
	-msg.sender.call.value(_am)() patch_7.sol#26-30
